blog.name: boutardieu
blog.title: The Parmenides Parlor
blog.description:
Subculture is to culture what mustard is to mayonnaise : you theoretically don't need it, but without it, you have 90% chances to end up with a bland and mushy porridge you'd rather shoot yourself in the head than use.

Plus... Come on, guys. It's mustard.

summary:
Midoriya Izuku : You look like a pretty fashionable guy, Aoyama... What did you think about my hero costume? Be honest.
Aoyama...
body:
Midoriya Izuku : You look like a pretty fashionable guy, Aoyama... What did you think about my hero costume? Be honest.
Aoyama Yuuga : Ugh, her mind... The color coordination. The fabrics. The fitting. The practicality. The finition. The luchador moment. The silver neckpiece. The All Might reference. The Super Sentai nod. [teary-eyed] The flair. The nerve. The irreverence. I can't even... You can't. You just can't.
Midoriya Izuku : ...
Midoriya Izuku : Okay, thanks, but, uh... did you LIKE it?

dialogue.name: Midoriya Izuku
dialogue.label: Midoriya Izuku :
dialogue.phrase: You look like a pretty fashionable guy, Aoyama... What did you think about my hero costume? Be honest.

The Super Sentai nod. [teary-eyed] The flair. The nerve. The irreverence. I can't even... You can't. You just can't.

blog.name: writtenbymonte
blog.title: moved to monteblake.
blog.description: MASTERLIST

tags: wow this was long and i enjoyed every bit of it guys
sorry guys im actually obessed with this guy so this was gonna happen eventually
title: relationship with shinsou hitoshi hcs
body:
this was a long time coming you guys. ive fallen in love with this guy over the summer and nothing can stop me from waiting for his spotlight in season 4. hope you guys enjoy <3

  • first thing first, we need to establish that to have any decent connection with Shinsou, you have to be wiling to spend the time and effort to get to know him. He will not naturally open up to you and will dismiss at the thought of having anyone getting to know geniunely. He will be on his guard in case you had ulterior motives. The first few weeks of getting to know him consist of little to no small talk and long periods of silence.
  • The only times you really get to know is just the walks after school or before school. Maybe it was the fatigue from the school day, but he’s more open to teasing remarks and dry humor.
  • The more time you get to know him, despite his noncompliance, his small mannerisms become noticeable. How his fingers picked at the dry skin of his lips, how his voice laughed with an adorably awkward lilt, how his eyebrows crease when you act like an oddball. When you voice these things to him, he blinks in wonder.
  • Nobody has ever took notice to him before, excluding Aizawa. How was it possible you didn’t see him outside his quirk? It was weirdly uplifting.
  • He wants to learn more on what you notice about him.
  • This starts the shared extensive training sessions and long library hours to better each other’s quirk. He begins to gradually acknowledge your determination and hard working ethic. Shinsou also begins to notice how you bit your lip in deep thought, tap your foot anxiously, and other small touches that no one else would notice.
  • That’s how you become friends or “friendly acquaintances”, as he puts it.
  • You don’t change him but support him to the best of his abilities.
  • Over time, you kinda view him as a tall pillar. He’s not fazed by others’ remarks about him and is so driven to get to the hero course. It gives you a reason to do better and you’re glad to him around.
  • You cry tears of pure joy and relief at the end of the Sports Festival. Everyone begins to regains his worth that you’ve noticed a long time ago. It fills you up with elation and when express it to him, Shinsou can’t help but give a warm smile.
  • You’re the first one he tells when he’s being taken under Aizawa’s wing. You’re practically over the moon and just hug him in the moment, telling him how proud you are on how far he’s come.
  • You pull away once you realize what you did, blushing like a mad men.
  • He pulls you back and returns the hug.
  • “Thank you…” His voice soft and raw.
  • From that day on, he dedicates himself to working hard for you too.
  • Everyone in U.A. already knew you guys were a thing. It was so obvious that you blushed when your classmate finally told you. And you didn’t deny it.
  • Shinsou took a while to acknowledge your feelings for you. It was a weird feeling for him and it got annoying how you easily invaded his mind. He’s never knew someone that could become so important to him in a matter of months.
  • Your first kiss came unexpectantly. You can imagine that on your own time.
  • Constant support and validation everyday. Shinsou doesn’t show it, but he appreciates it deeply.
  • He likes to kiss on the temple or the cheek.
  • He likes to be kissed on the forehead or his eyebrows.
  • Not a fan of PDA, but will lean on your shoulder or rest his head on your lap any day .
  • Just likes to rest his forehead against yours and close his eyes for reassurance.
  • You guys have a long list of inside jokes.
  • Late night calls where you guys lay on your bed and talk about nonsense. One of you falls always falls asleep and complains about your phone being dead the next day.
  • I feel like he would be the most experienced with dealing with anxiety and stress than anybody. He’s definitely dealt with it before with his quirk and how strangers react to it. Seeing you in such a panicked state indistinctly makes him grab your hand and intently listen to you. He prioritizes your safety and just make you feel emotionally secure, day in and out.
  • Being honest and open and weird is a must.
  • If you don’t cackle like a witch or quote horribly funny memes, then how will he know that you’re being real with him?
  • He’ll indulge in your meme-ry by sending a funny cat photo he found.
  • If you don’t like cats get out
  • Nah just kidding.
  • But seriously beware of him building a bond with every one he sees.
  • Fck if Aizawa loves you, then he’s fcking done
  • When you two fight, the silent treatment lasts for days. It’s agonizing and probably worse than death itself.
  • You two love each other so much it hurts.
  • Like literally your relationship is so strong that it could break stone, diamond, platinum-
  • Everything that’s needed in a relationship (honesty, trust, endless devotion) just comes naturally with you two.
  • He sees as his literal ray of sunshine bc wow your brighten his mood in like an instant, not that he would tell you. Everyone else sucks but you suck less lol
  • There’s no judgement bc you two aren’t about that life.
  • If you revealed you had six fingers, he would be like “that’s it?” but in a less rude way.
  • You have to have alligator skin to his blunt and frigid comments. He doesn’t sugar coat things.
  • He doesn’t think of love often but does not to take it lightly.
  • If you are the one, he will be willing to run mountains, cross raging streams, sweat buckets, to be with you. He will be in so deep.
  • You tell him his “creepy” smiles are endearing and he rolls his eyes (and dies a little on the inside).
  • Little competitions between you two are fairly common. Tests, staring contests, who can make which person laugh first-you name it. Food is always the prize. So practically an ensured date
  • He tends to get possessive when he sees you interact with a ‘rival’ or someone that makes you laugh uncontrollably. But the most he’ll do is just sit beside you or hold your hand, staring coldly directly in the person’s eyes, while you continue to chatter on. You notice it and pull him aside afterwards, reassuring how you adore him like no one else in pure tenderness.
  • Adding on to that, his commitment to you is not to be joked about. If anyone tells him that you’re cheating on him, he tells them that they’re full of shit and just walks away.
  • Not a fan of pet names. It leaves a gross taste in his mouth and your name is pretty enough to him.
  • Okay maybe “babe” or “love” but in private.
  • A man to show his feelings through action than words. Shinsou believes it way more powerful that way. He’ll pack you that lunch you forgot, saying it was my big deal. He’ll take you on simple dates to the store or mall. If he’s gonna say “I love you”, it’s either saying it straightforward (which is reserved for special occasions) or thoughtful deeds.
  • Shinsou’s only used his quirk on you once. It was when you kept insistently asking him what his quirk was and wanted you to shut up. The guy looks back on it now and promises to never use it against your will again.
  • He doesn’t believe in awkward silence. Talking is fine with him, but seems to relax when you are just in each other’s prescence, no words spoken at all.
  • Run your damn hands through this lavender bed hair, I swear to FCKING GOd
  • Shinsou likes to curl around your body and just listen to your heartbeat. It’s one of the only things that can fully put him in a deep sleep.
  • In conclusion he’s a keeper. thank you for coming to my ted talk.

  • There’s no judgement bc you two aren’t about that life.
  • If you revealed you had six fingers, he would be like “that’s it?” but in a less rude way.
  • You have to have alligator skin to his blunt and frigid comments. He doesn’t sugar coat things.
  • He doesn’t think of love often but does not to take it lightly.
  • If you are the one, he will be willing to run mountains, cross raging streams, sweat buckets, to be with you. He will be in so deep.
  • You tell him his “creepy” smiles are endearing and he rolls his eyes (and dies a little on the inside).
  • Little competitions between you two are fairly common. Tests, staring contests, who can make which person laugh first-you name it. Food is always the prize. So practically an ensured date
  • He tends to get possessive when he sees you interact with a ‘rival’ or someone that makes you laugh uncontrollably. But the most he’ll do is just sit beside you or hold your hand, staring coldly directly in the person’s eyes, while you continue to chatter on. You notice it and pull him aside afterwards, reassuring how you adore him like no one else in pure tenderness.
  • Adding on to that, his commitment to you is not to be joked about. If anyone tells him that you’re cheating on him, he tells them that they’re full of shit and just walks away.
  • Not a fan of pet names. It leaves a gross taste in his mouth and your name is pretty enough to him.
  • Okay maybe “babe” or “love” but in private.
  • A man to show his feelings through action than words. Shinsou believes it way more powerful that way. He’ll pack you that lunch you forgot, saying it was my big deal. He’ll take you on simple dates to the store or mall. If he’s gonna say “I love you”, it’s either saying it straightforward (which is reserved for special occasions) or thoughtful deeds.
  • Shinsou’s only used his quirk on you once. It was when you kept insistently asking him what his quirk was and wanted you to shut up. The guy looks back on it now and promises to never use it against your will again.
  • He doesn’t believe in awkward silence. Talking is fine with him, but seems to relax when you are just in each other’s prescence, no words spoken at all.
  • Run your damn hands through this lavender bed hair, I swear to FCKING GOd
  • Shinsou likes to curl around your body and just listen to your heartbeat. It’s one of the only things that can fully put him in a deep sleep.
  • In conclusion he’s a keeper. thank you for coming to my ted talk.
trail.content:
this was a long time coming you guys. ive fallen in love with this guy over the summer and nothing can stop me from waiting for his spotlight in season 4. hope you guys enjoy <3

  • first thing first, we need to establish that to have any decent connection with Shinsou, you have to be wiling to spend the time and effort to get to know him. He will not naturally open up to you and will dismiss at the thought of having anyone getting to know geniunely. He will be on his guard in case you had ulterior motives. The first few weeks of getting to know him consist of little to no small talk and long periods of silence.
  • The only times you really get to know is just the walks after school or before school. Maybe it was the fatigue from the school day, but he’s more open to teasing remarks and dry humor.
  • The more time you get to know him, despite his noncompliance, his small mannerisms become noticeable. How his fingers picked at the dry skin of his lips, how his voice laughed with an adorably awkward lilt, how his eyebrows crease when you act like an oddball. When you voice these things to him, he blinks in wonder.
  • Nobody has ever took notice to him before, excluding Aizawa. How was it possible you didn’t see him outside his quirk? It was weirdly uplifting.
  • He wants to learn more on what you notice about him.
  • This starts the shared extensive training sessions and long library hours to better each other’s quirk. He begins to gradually acknowledge your determination and hard working ethic. Shinsou also begins to notice how you bit your lip in deep thought, tap your foot anxiously, and other small touches that no one else would notice.
  • That’s how you become friends or “friendly acquaintances”, as he puts it.
  • You don’t change him but support him to the best of his abilities.
  • Over time, you kinda view him as a tall pillar. He’s not fazed by others’ remarks about him and is so driven to get to the hero course. It gives you a reason to do better and you’re glad to him around.
  • You cry tears of pure joy and relief at the end of the Sports Festival. Everyone begins to regains his worth that you’ve noticed a long time ago. It fills you up with elation and when express it to him, Shinsou can’t help but give a warm smile.
  • You’re the first one he tells when he’s being taken under Aizawa’s wing. You’re practically over the moon and just hug him in the moment, telling him how proud you are on how far he’s come.
  • You pull away once you realize what you did, blushing like a mad men.
  • He pulls you back and returns the hug.
  • “Thank you…” His voice soft and raw.
  • From that day on, he dedicates himself to working hard for you too.
  • Everyone in U.A. already knew you guys were a thing. It was so obvious that you blushed when your classmate finally told you. And you didn’t deny it.
  • Shinsou took a while to acknowledge your feelings for you. It was a weird feeling for him and it got annoying how you easily invaded his mind. He’s never knew someone that could become so important to him in a matter of months.
  • Your first kiss came unexpectantly. You can imagine that on your own time.
  • Constant support and validation everyday. Shinsou doesn’t show it, but he appreciates it deeply.
  • He likes to kiss on the temple or the cheek.
  • He likes to be kissed on the forehead or his eyebrows.
  • Not a fan of PDA, but will lean on your shoulder or rest his head on your lap any day .
  • Just likes to rest his forehead against yours and close his eyes for reassurance.
  • You guys have a long list of inside jokes.
  • Late night calls where you guys lay on your bed and talk about nonsense. One of you falls always falls asleep and complains about your phone being dead the next day.
  • I feel like he would be the most experienced with dealing with anxiety and stress than anybody. He’s definitely dealt with it before with his quirk and how strangers react to it. Seeing you in such a panicked state indistinctly makes him grab your hand and intently listen to you. He prioritizes your safety and just make you feel emotionally secure, day in and out.
  • Being honest and open and weird is a must.
  • If you don’t cackle like a witch or quote horribly funny memes, then how will he know that you’re being real with him?
  • He’ll indulge in your meme-ry by sending a funny cat photo he found.
  • If you don’t like cats get out
  • Nah just kidding.
  • But seriously beware of him building a bond with every one he sees.
  • Fck if Aizawa loves you, then he’s fcking done
  • When you two fight, the silent treatment lasts for days. It’s agonizing and probably worse than death itself.
  • You two love each other so much it hurts.
  • Like literally your relationship is so strong that it could break stone, diamond, platinum-
  • Everything that’s needed in a relationship (honesty, trust, endless devotion) just comes naturally with you two.
  • He sees as his literal ray of sunshine bc wow your brighten his mood in like an instant, not that he would tell you. Everyone else sucks but you suck less lol
  • There’s no judgement bc you two aren’t about that life.
  • If you revealed you had six fingers, he would be like “that’s it?” but in a less rude way.
  • You have to have alligator skin to his blunt and frigid comments. He doesn’t sugar coat things.
  • He doesn’t think of love often but does not to take it lightly.
  • If you are the one, he will be willing to run mountains, cross raging streams, sweat buckets, to be with you. He will be in so deep.
  • You tell him his “creepy” smiles are endearing and he rolls his eyes (and dies a little on the inside).
  • Little competitions between you two are fairly common. Tests, staring contests, who can make which person laugh first-you name it. Food is always the prize. So practically an ensured date
  • He tends to get possessive when he sees you interact with a ‘rival’ or someone that makes you laugh uncontrollably. But the most he’ll do is just sit beside you or hold your hand, staring coldly directly in the person’s eyes, while you continue to chatter on. You notice it and pull him aside afterwards, reassuring how you adore him like no one else in pure tenderness.
  • Adding on to that, his commitment to you is not to be joked about. If anyone tells him that you’re cheating on him, he tells them that they’re full of shit and just walks away.
  • Not a fan of pet names. It leaves a gross taste in his mouth and your name is pretty enough to him.
  • Okay maybe “babe” or “love” but in private.
  • A man to show his feelings through action than words. Shinsou believes it way more powerful that way. He’ll pack you that lunch you forgot, saying it was my big deal. He’ll take you on simple dates to the store or mall. If he’s gonna say “I love you”, it’s either saying it straightforward (which is reserved for special occasions) or thoughtful deeds.
  • Shinsou’s only used his quirk on you once. It was when you kept insistently asking him what his quirk was and wanted you to shut up. The guy looks back on it now and promises to never use it against your will again.
  • He doesn’t believe in awkward silence. Talking is fine with him, but seems to relax when you are just in each other’s prescence, no words spoken at all.
  • Run your damn hands through this lavender bed hair, I swear to FCKING GOd
  • Shinsou likes to curl around your body and just listen to your heartbeat. It’s one of the only things that can fully put him in a deep sleep.
  • In conclusion he’s a keeper. thank you for coming to my ted talk.
